content: Can you help me optimize my code using NumPy vectorization?

Absolutely! NumPy vectorization is a technique used to speed up array processing by applying operations directly to entire arrays without the need for explicit loops. This often results in more readable and efficient code. To help you optimize your code using NumPy vectorization, I'll need to see the specific code you're working with. Please share the portion of the code you want to optimize, and I'll provide guidance on how to vectorize it.
